TEXT.TITLE: LEADER DEVELOPMENT <LDCO.O> MERGER APPROVED
TEXT.BODY: Leader Development Corp said shareholders at the annual meeting approved the acquisition of privately-held Clinton American Corp and two related partnerships for 3,450,000 common shares, with the transaction to be accounted for as a pooling of interests. The company said Clinton president F. Daniel Ryan will become president of Leader. Reuter
